column4: what happens if you terminal, sudo nautilus and then delete /media/XXXX when it is unplugged and then try again?
it's not in media. it's a luks-encrypted usb disk. the error is that device udisks-luks-uuid-blah already exists
it doesn't even get to mounting it
en ca case, i am hopeless, pretty new to it all really. other than drivers, i would be lost
